symptoms: Maybe a stifling sensation in the chest
Spitting up of mucus with a loud, raspy sound
Severe cases: Tonic-clonic convulsions Sudden shrieking Incontinence of urine or stool

contraindications: Do not use without modification for those with Liver Fire with Phlegm-Heat.
Do not use without modification for those with Liver and Kidney Yin Deficiency.
Do not use without modification for those with Spleen and Stomach Deficiency.

notes: This condition most commonly occurs in children.
